full_summary:
=====================================

### Government Tender Announcement
#### terminated status

**Tender ID**: PW-22-01017663

**Cancellation Date**: This notice has been cancelled, and no further action is required.

**Background**
------------

On December 20, 2022, Defence Construction Canada invited proposals for the provision of construction services (Classe de marchés 5121A, Sélection du GAL, de Droit Public.)

### Description
-----------------

This tender opportunity has been cancelled, and Defence Construction Canada will no longer be accepting bids.

### Important Dates
-----------------

*   **Publication Date**: December 20, 2022
*   **Cancellation Date**: This notice has been cancelled

### Sectors of Opportunity
-------------------------

*   Canada
*   Europe
*   Mexico
*   United States

### Relevant Trade Agreements
-----------------------------

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Procedure
-----------

As this tender has been cancelled, all inquiries and requested information will not be addressed further

### Contact Information

This information is available in English and French. Contact Defence Construction Canada for further information

#### Terms of Use

This government tender notice has been provided in good faith.
